alert.note: Alert for Hardeman; Haywood; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 5:25PM CDT until May 27 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Hardeman County in west Tennessee... East central Haywood County in west Tennessee... Southwestern Madison County in west Tennessee... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 524 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bemis, or 7 miles southwest of Jackson, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Cloverport, Mercer, Toone, Medon, Neely, Teague, Huntersville, Denmark, Leighton, Hatchie and Uptonville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
